QuestionTxt: (I'm going to read you a list of specific elements or parts of the (2010 health reform) law.  For each, please tell me whether you think it is included in the health reform law, or not.) To the best of your knowledge, would you say the health reform law does or does not...establish a government panel to make decisions about end-of-life care for people on Medicare?
SubPopulation: Asked of Form A half sample
StudyNote: 602 respondents were interviewed on a landline telephone, and 602 were interviewed on a cell phone, including 315 who had no landline telephone.

RespTxt: No, law does not do this
